title: Cybersecurity Incident: Attack follows pattern: Multi-stage attack: Reconn
summary: Investigation completed with 13 alerts and 7 anomalies detected. Attack spans 5 MITRE ATT&CK tactics: Reconnaissance, Initial Access, Privilege Escalation. Primary hypothesis: Attack follows pattern: Multi-stage attack: Reconnaissance → Initial Access → Privilege Escalation → Credential Access → Exfiltration (confidence: 80%).
root_cause: Attack follows pattern: Multi-stage attack: Reconnaissance → Initial Access → Privilege Escalation → Credential Access → Exfiltration
